approval.1: Upon submission of the application by the company
approval.2: Based on the result of the scoring assessment of the company application
approval.3: By the decision of the accreditation commission

empty.filter: The search has not given any results
empty.items: Your company has not published any registries. You can create and publish a registry in the registry management section.

default.title: You do not have access to this part of the registry.
default.text: Contact your registry administrator to obtain rights in the registry.

rights.title: You do not have access to this part of the registry.
rights.text: Contact your registry administrator to obtain rights in the registry "{{ value }}".

archive.title: The work with the registry has been stopped.
archive.text:
The registry "{{ value }}" is archived.
Have questions? Contact your Registry Administrator.

related.title: Before applying to the Vendor List, a vendor should be accredited in the related Vendors Lists:

process.title: Application for accreditation in the registry
process.empty: You do not need to complete a vendor questionnaire to apply to this registry.

submitted.title: Application for accreditation submitted
submitted.text: The registry owner is reviewing your application. We will let you know the result.

obsolete.title: Application for accreditation in the registry
obsolete.message: The registry owner has changed the questionnaire. Prepare a new application.
obsolete.notice: Previously entered data is transferred to the new application. Check if they are correct.

1.title: Exclude company from registry
1.description: The company will be excluded from the registry and will not be able to initiate re-inclusion

2.title: Invite company to the registry
2.description: The company will be able to reapply for inclusion in the registry

3.title: Suspend accreditation
3.description: The company is temporarily losing its accreditation in this registry. To restore accreditation, a company can reapply

4.title: Restore accreditation
4.description: The company's status in the registry will be restored

5.title: Request data update
5.description: The company will receive a letter with a request to update the data specified in the application for accreditation in this registry

block.title: Exclude company from registry
block.text: The company loses accreditation (if any) in this registry and cannot initiate re-inclusion for the restoration of accreditation. The action is reversible, you can invite the company to the registry again.

reason.label: Specify the reason...
reason.hint: The reason will be passed on to the employees of the excluded company

unblock.title: Invite company to the registry
unblock.text: The company will be able to reapply for inclusion in the registry.

suspend.title: Suspend accreditation
suspend.text: The company loses accreditation in this registry, but can independently initiate a re-application. The action is reversible, you can restore the accreditation of the company in the future.

reason.label: Specify the reason...
reason.hint: The reason will be shown to employees of the company

unsuspend.title: Restore accreditation
unsuspend.text: The company's status in the registry will be restored

renew.title: Request data update
renew.text: The company will receive a letter with a request to update the data specified in the application for accreditation in this registry.

reason.label: Specify the reason...
reason.hint: The reason will be shown to employees of the company

renew.success: Data update request has been sent

invite_by_link.title: Invite by link
invite_by_link.descr: Invitation link for onboarding in the vendor pool

invite_from_site.title: Invite from the platform
invite_from_site.descr: Companies will apply for onboarding in the vendor pool

accredit_from_site.title: Onboard from the platform
accredit_from_site.descr: Companies will be onboarded in the vendor pool without filling out the questionnaire

invite_by_link.title: Invite by link
invite_by_link.text: Copy and send the link to the representative of the company you want to invite for accreditation in the registry.
invite_by_link.hint: Press Ctrl + C to copy to clipboard

no-rights.text:
You are not eligible to apply for accreditation.

Contact your company administrator for the right to complete the action.

anonymous.message: Find your company or register your business on Bidzaar
anonymous.notice:
Register yor company for free on
Bidzaar to be accredited in the registry
